        bmp - Processed bitmap image

      • keepColorRS

        public void keepColorRS(android.content.Context ctx,
                        android.graphics.Bitmap bmp,
                        float hue,
                        float tolerance)
        Generate an image which only changes color for a certain range of hue between hue & chromakey.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context from which the RenderScript will run
        bmp - Processed bitmap image
        hue - initial hue value
        tolerance - closing hue value

      • colorize

        Parameters:
        ctx - Context from which the RenderScript will run
        bmp - processed bitmap image
        hue - hue value to append

        green_coef - green value coefficient

      • apply_filter

        public void apply_filter(android.content.Context ctx,
                         android.graphics.Bitmap bmp,
                         float[] core,
                         int core_length,
                         int div)
        Apply Convolution filter in core field to bitmap image by using div.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context from which the RenderScript will run
        bmp - processed bitmap image
        core - filter to pass
        core_length - length of filter to pass
        div - division to apply

                    android.graphics.Bitmap bmp1,
                    android.graphics.Bitmap bmp2)
        Mix two bitmap images into one.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context from which the RenderScript will run
        bmp - The result bitmap image
        bmp1 - The first bitmap image to mix
        bmp2 - The second bitmap image to mix
